original_title: Sunday School final exam to be held on Dec. 28 & 29
original_body_lines: The final examinations of Buddhist Dhamma Schools and Catholic, Hindu and Islam Sunday Schools will be held on 28 and 29 December, 2023, said the Commissioner General of Examinations, Amith Jayasundara.
Accordingly, the exams will be held in 669 examination centres across the island, according to the Department of Examinations.
Mr. Jayasundara further stated that the admissions of the students for the examination have already been sent to the relevant schools via posts.

The students expecting to sit for the examination and who have not received the admissions yet can visit the official website of the Department of Examinations and download the relevant documents using the username and password issued to the Sunday School Heads by the department through https://apps.exams.gov.lk/principals/admissions
